description: Protect Your MicroSoft Surface Series Tablets, with i-Blason Bubble Free Screen protectors!i-Blason Anti-Glare Screen Protectorsprovide the highest transparency while still delivering scratch resistant protection for your Surface tablets with amazing patent pending bubble free technology which enables you to apply the screen protectors in seconds!Misalignment? No Worries. Just remove the bubble free screen protector, realign and reapply. You are good to go. Just as simple as that.All i-Blason Screen protectors are made of the highest quality Japanese PET Film available with 100% Bubble-Free Silicon Adhesives.Every i-Blason Screen Protector is backed by thei-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY!COMPATIBILITY:MicroSoft Surface Tablet Series (Please pick the right size for your tablet)The i-Blason Screen Protector Kit Includes:- One i-Blason HD Anti-Glare Bubble Free Screen Protector- Installation Instructions- Microfiber Polishing Cloth- Bubble Removal Tape- Retail Packagingi-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTYWe are committed to your satisfaction and will send you replacements free of charge for:- Installation Problems such as bubbles or other user error- Scratched or damaged screen protectors- Wear and TearOur commitment to you is that we will keep your device protected, i-Blason Bubble Free Guaranteed, or your money back.
title: i-Blason HD Matte Anti Glare Bubble Free Screen Protector for MS MicroSoft Surface Tablet RT Windows 8 Tablet Reusable
